text: [Music]
this painting from 1524 could be
considered the first selfie in history
it sure looks like one parmesano a
21-year-old Italian artist painted
himself using a barber mirror he gave it
to the pope as a gift so even at the
beginning it was established selfies are
for sharing in terms of drawing rembrand
put together this pretty great duckface
self-portrait in 1630 the first photo
self-portrait was taken by Robert
Cornelius a chemist from Philadelphia he
had to take off the lens cap run into
frame sit for 1 minute then run back and
cover up the lens selfies used to take
that kind of commitment the modern
selfie began with the first true camera
phone which was made by sharp and
released in Japan in November of 2000 it
had a mirror next to the lens so was
basically designed for selfies even
though that term wouldn't be coined
until 2002 in Australia where they have
a habit of adding the suffix IE to
things like Barbie for barbecue and
Aussie for Australia in 2011 Jennifer
Lee became the first person to use use
the # selfie on Instagram since then
it's been used more than 80 million
times but there aren't as many selfies
posted as you might think only about 5%
of Instagram picks are Selfies the city
with the most Instagram selfies per
capita is Manila in the Philippines
number two is New York City three is
Miami and at number four Anaheim
California thanks to Disneyland the
fourth most magical place on Earth to
take a picture of yourself across the
world women take way more selfies than
men they also tilt their heads more a
12.3 de tilt for women versus only 88.2%
for men the average selfie photographer
is 23.7 years old but in the over 40
selfie crowd photographers are more
likely to be male than female as you
probably know selfie was the Oxford
English dictionary's word of the year in
2013 a year that included the first ever
pope selfie and President Obama's selfie
at Mandela's memorial service but it
wouldn't be until 2014 that Ellen's
Oscar selfie blew up Twitter and became
the most r tweeted tweet ever in the
grand scheme of things selfie history is
still in its infancy will continue to
evolve or is it already in Decline what
do you think
[Music]
